resources.string:
Welcome to use PLog!

This is a powerful, light-weight and active developed library.

Basic and common usages are shown below. For more details, please checkout from GitHub or see Wiki.
We need access external storage to save local crash files, please click allow to continue.
Crash printer is unavailable until you granted permission.
Emulated crash information is saved on %s.
NOTE: This view printer is just for fun, please see logcat or file output to get a practical experience.
